_header: Listen all great and small / I shall you tell a little tale
Note: Ends imperfectly, lines 1-192; for another version of the same section, see 2809.
Title(s): Chateau d'Amour ; The Four Daughters of God
_description: The Four Daughters of God, a paraphrase of one section of Grosseteste’s Chateau d’Amour — 32 tail-rhyme stanzas

BLCottAppVII.First Lines:
[L]ystyns all gret and smaleI shall ȝow tell a lytell
                    tale…
BLCottAppVII.Last Lines:
…In powere and in digniteAnd þe wisdome am I of
                    þe

         68 (1933-34): 188-94: 189-94.
